__e: Even when you're surrounded by your enemies, that protects you.
Looked like we didn't have nobody in the world but enemies.
I and my oath had been surrounded by enemies.
- We're dining out to show our enemies we're not afraid.
I tried to convince her that she was safe here, but she couldn't stop looking for enemies when she was among friends.
I tried to help those who lived here to make peace with their enemies, but I see now there's no use.
